component.name: ImageMagick
component.summary: Create, edit, compose, or convert bitmap images

description.p: Read and write PNG, JPEG, JPEG-2000, GIF, TIFF, DPX, EXR, WebP, Postscript, PDF, and SVG. Resize, flip, mirror, rotate, distort, shear and transform images, adjust image colors, apply various special effects, or draw text, lines, polygons, ellipses, and Beier curves
